Articles.Content:
Here is a project of mine started that started its life as a Harbinger gunship (Red Alert 3 Uprising) replica , but later on turned in to a custom designed aircraft.

Not long after i started the build i noticed that making a stock replica of the Harbinger was a bit too difficult since the design that i had looked a bit silly with the cockpit being way out of shape and the engines being way too small and the way too big, plus the rudders looked a bit rediculous after i had made them.

the aircraft performs really well: its very manouverable and has a top speed of about 230 m/s in low altitude. Its also pretty much rock solid when you put the sas on making aiming with the 2 howitzers very easy from long range.

It can takeoff at a speed of about 55 m/s but be careful when you do this cause if you pull up full, the rear will hit the ground and it will blow up.

The picks below are for the gunship version witch is armed with 2 howitzers on the left side and a vulcan minigun at the nose. it also has a camera on the bottom for aming when in IVA and it and the Troopship have 8 seats in theb cargobay.

I also made a stock version of this name the KTP-100 Troopship.

As you can see its easy to hit targets even from a long range.

But when you run out of shells to fire you can always use the vulcan minigun. Also it very useful for taking down small fast moving targets like helicopters and fast scout cars or even other aircrafts.

After around 11 to 12 minutes and 100 shells fired away the KSC was no more. The only thing that was left standing where the flagpoles and a single little building.

 

 

I have to say that i think the gunship is a much better and efficient way of taking down ground targets than a big heavy bomber like my KHB-52 (full size B-52 replica).

So i hope you enjoyed this crazy creation of mine . Now excuse me while i go and mend the KSC back into shape.

Mod used: BD-Armoury
